1369.name: NiFe 60/40 K
1369.Applications: NiFe 60/40 K is suitable for welding grey and malleable cast iron, equally suitable for SG iron. Use this type in case a high tensile strength is required and due to the special coating to weld in difficult welding positions.
1369.Suitable_For: Spheroidal cast iron, deluted cast iron, old cast iron, steel to cast iron etc. EN 1561: EN-GJL-100 (GG10) till EN-GJL-350 (GG35), EN 1562: EN-GJMB-350 (GTS 35) till EN-GJMB-550 (GTS 55), EN- GJMW-350 (GTW 35) till EN- GJMW-550 (GTW 55), EN1563: EN-GJS-400 (GGG 40) till EN-GJS-700 (GGG 70).
